医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
童年时期接触农田如何影响炎症性肠病风险？生命早期环境暴露对炎症性肠病 (IBD)、溃疡性结肠炎 (UC) 和克罗恩病 (CD) 风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/How-does-childhood-exposure-to-agriculture-land-influence-lingual-bowel-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/How-does-childhood-exposure-to-agriculture-land-influence-lingual-bowel-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aefe4eec-788c-4c68-90a5-513d4e316eec Wed, 13 Mar 2024 08:25:00 -0400 How does childhood exposure to agricultural land influence inflammatory bowel disease risk?
LGM Pharma 推出增强型分析测试服务，并通过额外的栓剂制造能力扩展 CDMO 产品组合LGM Pharma 是一家为整个药品生命周期提供定制 API 和 CDMO 服务的领先供应商，今天宣布其能力显着增强：扩张 50%，并对其独立的分析测试服务 (ATS) 产品和服务投资超过 200 万美元。将新的栓剂制造能力引入其合同开发和制造（CDMO）产品组合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/LGM-Pharma-unveils-enhanced-analytical-testing-services-and-expands-CDMO-portfolio-with-additional-suppository-manufacturing-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/LGM-Pharma-unveils-enhanced-analytical-testing-services-and-expands-CDMO-portfolio-with-additional-suppository-manufacturing-capability.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e477d67-e0f7-4768-816c-47eda23a2eea Wed, 13 Mar 2024 08:06:00 -0400 LGM Pharma unveils enhanced analytical testing services and expands CDMO portfolio with additional suppository manufacturing capabilities
Bio-Techne 将出席 KeyBanc 生命科学与医疗科技投资者论坛Bio-Techne Corporation 今天宣布，蛋白质科学部门总裁 Will Geist 将于美国东部时间 2024 年 3 月 19 日星期二上午 9:45 出席 KeyBanc 生命科学和医疗技术投资者论坛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Bio-Techne-to-present-at-the-KeyBanc-Life-Sciences-MedTech-Investor-Forum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Bio-Techne-to-present-at-the-KeyBanc-Life-Sciences-MedTech-Investor-Forum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d00b531-79ac-47b8-9c38-27af13af8a07 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 07:58:00 -0400 Bio-Techne to present at the KeyBanc Life Sciences & MedTech Investor Forum
研究揭示了脑外伤后新的大脑恢复机制由 Onder Albayram 博士领导的南卡罗来纳医科大学研究小组在 PNAS Nexus 上报告说，他们发现了一种新的保护性反应，大脑可以在脑外伤后自然修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-reveals-novel-brain-recovery-mechanism-after-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-reveals-novel-brain-recovery-mechanism-after-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a59e3b3-2de5-4c7b-9aab-dff8701f8229 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 07:47:28 -0400 Study reveals novel brain recovery mechanism after traumatic brain injury
研究强调了政府疫苗建议和直接面向消费者的药品广告的影响马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校经济学家共同撰写的一项新研究揭示了政府向制药商推荐疫苗的价值，以及直接向消费​​者宣传药品的潜在好处。除美国和新西兰外，这种做法在每个国家都被禁止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-highlights-impact-of-government-vaccine-recommendations-and-direct-to-consumer-pharmaceutical-advertising.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-highlights-impact-of-government-vaccine-recommendations-and-direct-to-consumer-pharmaceutical-advertising.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84436f6e-a3bc-4901-8418-e0a3107b5cb9 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 07:37:48 -0400 Study highlights impact of government vaccine recommendations and direct-to-consumer pharmaceutical advertising

改善年轻女孩的铁状况：食用强化铁的扁豆的影响将铁强化扁豆（IFL）纳入女性饮食的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Improving-iron-status-in-young-girls-The-impact-of-iron-fortified-lentil-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Improving-iron-status-in-young-girls-The-impact-of-iron-fortified-lentil-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=745b11f9-ce0b-478c-9489-63fbddab28be Wed, 13 Mar 2024 07:22:00 -0400 Improving iron status in young girls: The impact of iron-fortified lentil consumption
预测骨髓移植后心血管并发症风险的新工具每年对成千上万的美国人来说，骨髓移植有可能治愈白血病、淋巴瘤和免疫缺陷病等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Novel-tool-to-predict-a-persons-risk-for-cardioangio-complications-after-bone-marrow-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Novel-tool-to-predict-a-persons-risk-for-cardioangio-complications-after-bone-marrow-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8a6f1a4-12e7-4985-af51-1972e6067b93 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 07:15:16 -0400 Novel tool to predict a person's risk for cardiovascular complications after bone marrow transplant
曾经遭受阿片类药物过量困扰的西弗吉尼亚州城市面临“第四波”从 2006 年到 2014 年，超过 8100 万粒止痛药被运往这座城市和卡贝尔县周边农村地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/West-Virginia-city-once-battered-by-opioid-overdoses-confronts-e28098fourth-wavee28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/West-Virginia-city-once-battered-by-opioid-overdoses-confronts-e28098fourth-wavee28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=869844f2-1025-41f1-be93-aa288d1fa4f6 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 06:41:25 -0400 West Virginia city once battered by opioid overdoses confronts ‘fourth wave’
随着投资者团体购买非营利性疗养院，人们对护理质量的担忧日益加剧雪莉·奥尔森 (Shelly Olson) 的母亲患有痴呆症，她在威斯康星州姐妹湾 (Sister Bay) 乡村的斯坎迪亚村 ​​(Scandia Village) 疗养院生活了近五年。奥尔森说，起初，她的母亲在该机构得到了很好的照顾，该机构当时属于非营利组织“福音派路德好撒玛利亚人协会”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Concerns-grow-over-quality-of-care-as-investor-groups-buy-not-for-profit-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Concerns-grow-over-quality-of-care-as-investor-groups-buy-not-for-profit-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7056e7db-65d0-450c-8a68-10349513e156 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 06:39:00 -0400 Concerns grow over quality of care as investor groups buy not-for-profit nursing homes
